p:
Brain tissue was homogenized in (1:10 wv -1) pre-chilled KCL solution and transferred into a 20 ml tube. After incubation for 60 minutes at 37 Â°C, the suspension was mixed with 1 ml of 5% tetrachloroacetic acid and 1 ml of 67% TBA, and centrifuged for 15 minutes at 2,000 rpm. The resulting supernatant was transferred into a new tube and placed in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes. After cooling, its absorbance was measured at 535 nm.
14
